{{Infobox Key Item |name = Dungeon Ticket |image = [[File:Dungeonticket.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Dungeon Ticket''. |use = Allows entry to [[Dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} |obtain = Purchasable in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] for 100 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} }} ===Description=== This ticket grants access to all [[Dungeons]]. ===Acquisition=== Can be purchased at the [[Shops#Kanto:Locations & Items|Viridian City Shop]]. ===Effects=== You can enter [[Dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] gained by capturing Pok√©mon. {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
